shows.title: Ramayana

Through powerful narration, it traces Rama’s journey as Maryada Purushottama, highlighting his unwavering commitment to dharma, the trials of exile, the fierce battles against Ravana, and the deep devotion of Hanuman. The show not only covers the well-known episodes of Sita’s Agni Pariksha and Rama’s victory over evil but also explores lesser-known characters and untold stories from the epic. Rich in cultural wisdom, sacrifice, and moral lessons, this series inspires listeners with values of courage, righteousness, and the eternal triumph of good over evil.

shows.title: Waiting for Love ❤️
shows.description: Aditya Deshpandey  is a wealthy yet lonely businessman, and Roohi is a self-made woman who runs a food stall, battling the scars of broken relationships, a cruel daughter-in-law, and past humiliations. Their paths cross through Aditya’s daughter, Taanvi where a simple matchmaking attempt turns into a profound tale. Aditya hides his true identity, wanting to see if Roohi loves him or merely his wealth. But for Roohi, this relationship goes far beyond love — during this journey, she finds the daughter she lost five years ago.

shows.title: Where is Home
shows.description: This story is about the lives of two women who were switched at birth. As a result of this switch, one woman lives a different life, away from her biological parents, while the other burns with thoughts of revenge. When the truth comes to light, their lives become entangled with love, revenge, and long-hidden secrets.

shows.title: Wild Young Master Son-in-Law
shows.description: A young man with extraordinary martial arts skills who becomes a son-in-law by marrying into a powerful family. The show follows his adventures as he protects his family and rises to become a powerful figure in the martial arts world

shows.title: Witch Stars
shows.description: On Halloween, with the help of some sexy girls, four friends must confront an alien invasion that will force them to face monsters of any kinds, including the ones from their past....

shows.title: Wonder Boy Parth
shows.description: In a tale of betrayal and redemption, a visually impaired man named Parth harnesses ancient mystical powers from his mother’s locket to seek justice against those who wronged him, uncovering priceless treasures and battling dark forces in a city ruled by greed and deception.

shows.title: Yes Mr. CEO, We Have A Baby
shows.description: Her life as a respected business scion ended abruptly with an accidental pregnancy, leading to her family's swift disownment and public disgrace. Vanished for six years, she was presumed broken, forgotten. But she returns, not as a victim, but as a silent force of nature. Forged by hardship, she now eyes the very step-sister who built an empire on her ruin. This is a high-stakes saga of betrayal, resilience, and a calculated quest for vengeance set to reshape the powerful world she once lost.
